content.body: ... actually, I think we can get rid of "ongoing API method tracker" as well since it's all now in parameters
(but will look at that as a followup)

Noam Rosenthal: I think (unless I missed something) that we broke traversal navigations: The traverse navigate event (which would set the promoted flag) runs [async](https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#updating-the-traversable:fire-a-traverse-navigate-event), therefore _after_ we [created the result](https://whatpr.org/html/11762/305f5a1...d89ce86/nav-history-apis.html#:~:text=Return%20a%20navigation%20API%20method%20tracker%2Dderived%20result%20for%20apiMethodTracker%20%2E,-An), which checks aborts if the promoted flag is not set.
content.formatted_body: Noam Rosenthal: I think (unless I missed something) that we broke traversal navigations: The traverse navigate event (which would set the promoted flag) runs async, therefore after we created the result, which checks aborts if the promoted flag is not set.

content.body: oh ok those checks should only occur for reload/navigate
Noam Rosenthal: I think with that change it should be fine from my end.
content.formatted_body: Noam Rosenthal: I think with that change it should be fine from my end.

content.body: mfreed jarhar: there's like a half-dozen select-related issues I'd love your input on. Not sure they need meeting time, but I could nominate them if that would help.
